properties.areaDesc: Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
properties.headline: High Wind Watch issued March 1 at 8:36PM PST until March 3 at 12:00PM PST by NWS San Diego CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...North winds 20 to 35 mph with gusts to 65 mph possible.

* WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland
Empire and Santa Ana Mountains and Foothills.

* WHEN...From Monday afternoon through Tuesday morning. Strongest
gusts expected early Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds could blow down trees and power
lines. Power outages are possible. Travel could be hazardous,
especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Main area of concern is in the Inland
Empire below the Cajon Pass.
properties.instruction:
Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates on this
situation. Fasten loose objects or shelter objects in a safe
location prior to the onset of winds.

NWSheadline: HIGH WIND WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH TUESDAY MORNING
